description: Starting in the parking lot, we rapidily climb a hill, after that, up & down to the shelter at Lac Newman.  After dining, get back to the parking.  Wonderfull day whit some of our frends.
directions: Morin Heights, continue on QC/364 north to St-Adolphe d'Howard, turn right on 329, go 11 kilometers just in village you'll see the ACCUEIL at your right, pay your pass and go further to the next stop, turn right on Tour du Lac road.  At the tee turn right to Chemin Val de Loire and continue 1.7 kilometre the parking is on your left.
title: St-Adolphe d'Howard
